title: Matching
body:
This question component presents the user with one or more drop-down style questions. Upon submission, feedback can be provided for correct, incorrect and partially correct answers.

  • The number of attempts allowed may be configured
  • Each drop-down may contain its own set of options
  • Each drop-down can only include a single correct answer
  • The 'correct answer' button can be disabled
  • Options can be randomised
instruction: Choose an option from each drop down list and select Submit.

_items.text: Proin fermentum sapien sit amet dui ullamcorper maximus?

_options.text: Nunc orci justo, ultricies vel lobortis eu

_items.text: Nunc et hendrerit nunc. Phasellus dolor mi, efficitur at odio vel, interdum placerat nisi?

_options.text: Vivamus ut feugiat velit, vitae rhoncus sem

title: Slider
body:
This question component requires the learner to position a slider along a scale. Upon submission, feedback can be provided for correct, incorrect and partially correct answers.

  • The number of attempts allowed may be configured
  • The correct answer can be a single number (e. g. 7)
  • Or a correct range can be specified (e. g. between 5-10)
  • The 'correct answer' button can be disabled
instruction: Drag the slider to make your choice and select Submit.

_feedback.correct:
Well done!

Aliquam erat volutpat. Donec dui neque, suscipit at semper ullamcorper, ullamcorper vitae arcu. Nunc orci justo, ultricies vel lobortis eu, dapibus ut tellus.

Donec consequat elit eget nisi viverra, vel finibus justo condimentum. Etiam eleifend ornare purus eget pharetra. Phasellus tempus, leo quis egestas ullamcorper, velit mi maximus nunc, a tincidunt erat nulla at lorem. Ut sit amet magna nec risus interdum sagittis.
